CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Homemakers - These Junior Misses shown above are preparing themselves for active participation in improving conditions in their respective neighborhoods, in addition to being more efficient in home. In preparation for the duties that befall 'the woman in the home,' they are learning these techniques at Hill City. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Four girls, and Eunice Cook second from left, bathing doll on cot, in front of chalkboard and piano, at Hill City
